articles.title: NASA Seeks Student Ideas for 2024 Human Exploration Rover Challenge - NASA
articles.description: Students interested in designing, developing, building, and testing rovers for Moon and Mars exploration are invited to submit their proposals to NASA through Monday, Sept. 21.
